fields.System.Title: Implement an inactivity timer on the client side that prompts the user before logging out due to inactivity.

relations.url: <URL to the User Story 2 work item>

fields.System.Title: Configure the server-side session to keep track of inactivity and end the session if the inactivity timer expires.

relations.url: <URL to the User Story 2 work item>

fields.System.Title: Set a fixed maximum session duration after which the user must re-authenticate, regardless of activity level.

relations.url: <URL to the User Story 2 work item>

fields.System.Title: Create a server-side mechanism to check and handle the session expiration based on inactivity or the maximum duration.

relations.url: <URL to the User Story 2 work item>

fields.System.Title: Update unit and integration tests to cover session timeout scenarios.

relations.url: <URL to the User Story 2 work item>

fields.System.Title: Update the documentation to reflect new timeout settings and behavior.
